article_title: Social Security Benefits Rising 1.7% For 2015, Top Tax Up 1.3%

article_metadata.author: Janet Novack

og.description: The 1.7% COLA means the average retired worker will see a $22 increase to $1,328 a month and the average retired couple will get a $36 boost to $2,176.
